author: AP
title: Olympians become trainers to help those stranded at home
description: Many professional athletes are doing their bit to boost public health during the coronavirus pandemic
content:
DÜSSELDORF, Germany (AP) — Moving from the track to the living room, many athletes around the world are doing their bit to boost public health during the coronavirus pandemic.
There’s been an explosion of athletes offering free online fitness classes and tip… [+2901 chars]
